product_name: Leki Micro Vario Carbon Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Perfect for trail running and for short hikes and treks, the Leki Micro Vario Carbon Trekking Poles weigh next to nothing and collapse down to a mere 15 in. 100% carbon fiber shafts offer ultralight performance and strength. Lightweight Aergon Thermo extended grips feature an edgeless shape and a rubberized, textured surface to maximize comfort and minimize hand fatigue. Ergonomic corrective angle produces a neutral wrist position for optimal swing efficiency. Speed Lock is a powerful external locking system that activates quickly and easily-even when you're wearing thick gloves. Telescoping, carbon fiber poles extend to 51.2 in. and compact to 15 in. for travel and storage. Synthetic tips can flex up to 30deg without damaging the pole shaft; durable carbide tip ends optimize grip on ice and rocks. The Leki Micro Vario Carbon Trekking Poles come with a red mesh carry bag.
short_description: Perfect for trail running and for short hikes and treks, the Leki Micro Vario Carbon Trekking Poles weigh next to nothing and collapse down to a mere 15 in.
